task.title: Extract Project
task.shortdesc: Expand an old .phon or .zip project for use with the current version of Phon.

step.cmd: Click on a compressed project in the Project List pane to extract it to a directory in your workspace folder, or right-click (CTRL+click) on it and choose Extract project from the context menu.
step.stepresult: The project will be extracted to the workspace folder, and it will appear as an expanded (regular) project in the Project List. The original compressed project will be moved to the backups folder in your workspace. If the compressed project is not located in your current workspace folder, click Extract Project in the Workspace Actions pane, find and select the project in the Browse window, and click Open. This will extract the compressed project to your workspace folder. Original compressed projects extracted from locations outside the workspace folder will not be moved to the backups folder.
